pages.text: Items pulled from the pot of gold using red tree roots are rather plain. Your keen eye may have noticed that more advanced items require roots with a different color. However, only red trees naturally grow in the wild. Upon observing the leprechauns, I have learned that they were able to obtain tree saplings with a different color.
By harvesting tree leaves with a sickle made from arconium ingots of the same color as the leaves, sometimes the leaves will drop saplings of a different color.
